page.title: 19St. Barnabas Church Centre.
page.content: The church was built in 1933 and the Family Centre was opened in 1979. During the Second World War many of the houses around the church were bombed and fewer people went to the church.Factories were built in the streets all around.The Family Centre is in part of the church no longer needed,new buildings have been added.In the Centre there are activities for all ages from a playgroup to youth clubs,pensioners lunch clubs and a day centre for the elderly. It is open Monday to Saturday and there are 18 paid workers and 25 volunteers.
